title: No way to delete multiple e-mails at once
content:
Hi,

I am trying to remove a large number of e-mails from my Inbox. The standard advice says to hold down Ctrl or Shift and select e-mails, then right click, and choose rubbish bin symbol to delete. The advice says you will get a confirmation message, but that doesn't happen. Only the e-mail right clicked on actually deletes; all the rest stay put.

I have tried deleting the trash file to force it to recreate. I have tried updating Thunderbird, but I'm already on version 145.0. I use gmail.

Does anyone know of a working method for doing multiple deletions?
creator: gmoody02

title: I want to start using Thunderbird again
content:
I've been unable to use TB since July/August 2025. I don't have detailed documentation of the details, but my recollection is that an error was occurring whenever I would try to send an email. My troubleshooting led to the possibility that the problem was with the SMTP protocol.

Please let me know whether anything more was contributed here in this forum. Meanwhile I will install TB again and try to re-created the problem. Thanks for your help, SweetTasha
creator: pwrichcreek

title: can't add yahoo account on new Linux desktop.
content:
This is a new Fedora-42 desktop, upgraded (dnf upgrade) today. I installed Thunderbird today (dnf install thunderbird), after doing the operating system upgrade. I tried to add my yahoo e-mail account. Settings are as follows:

  • create accounts in the new Account Hub is unchecked (off).
  • accept cookies from sites is checked (on).
  • remember password is checked (on).
  • I'm using "IMAP".

When I click "Done", a separate window pops up in which yahoo asks for my password. After entering it, yahoo says "Something went wrong", and gives no other indication of what the problem is.

If I instead "Configure manually"... I tried both the default hostnames and "export.imap.mail.yahoo.com" for the outgoing server. I tried both "Normal Password" and "OAuth2" authentication methods.

In all the above cases, I get "Unable to log in at server. Probably wrong configuration , username or password." with a yellow background.

I see nothing of "Edge Too many requests" as was happening to several people recently.

How do I add my yahoo account to this new Thunderbird on Fedora-42?
creator: mattison_moz

title: As of today I am unable to download my emails into Thunderbird - does not accept the correct password
content: I have been using Thunderbird to access my comcast emails. I never had a problem with it. However, this afternoon, just out of the blue Thunderbird cannot download my emails, the following message popped up: "Login to server mail.comcast.net with username xxxxxxx failed." Then Thunderbird asks for a new password. When I enter the still correct password, it displays the same error message. I did not change anything in the settings before this error message popped up. I tried ChatGPT to get some answers, but whatever I changed it had no effect. I am attaching a screenshot of the server settings (I have of course removed my username). I would be grateful for any advice as to how to fix the issue. Thanking you.

title: Po nové aktualizaci Thunderbirdu je nefunkční hláška (zvuk) při nové příchozí poště.
content:
Dobrý den, 

sice je to problém neznatelný, ale jsem na výše uvedené zvyklí. Používám tohoto poštovního klienta už řadu let a nikdy se mi nestalo, že by hláška nefungovala.

Je s příponou "waw" a v nastavení kde je zvolit vlastní zvukový soubor kde je waw umístěn, tak při zkoušce přehrát je funkční a soubor senormálně přehraje. Tak jak to bylo funkční řadu let. Teď při nové verzi: 145.0 je to chluché i když ikonka na novou příchozí poštu signalizuje přijetí nové zprávy. Pokud by bylo něco poslat, budu rád, když se někdo ozve a pomůže mi. Moc děkuji za případné odpovědi, Hýbner Láďa vhy@volny.cz

title: Вопрос по программе Thunderbird
content:
Hello! I have a question regarding Thunderbird version 144.0.1.

The server is configured locally and isolated from the Internet. There is an issue: when the network cable is unplugged (no network connection), saving received emails with attachments (for example, total file size of 14 MB) to the hard drive happens quickly — about 5 seconds. However, as soon as the PC is connected to the local network, the saving process for such attachments slows down significantly — up to 60 seconds.

I would appreciate your help with analyzing this issue and possible solutions. What could be the cause of this behavior?

Thank you!

title: Does the profile folder contain a file "logins.db"?
content:
Hey,

I am seeing the creation of a file "logins.db" when opening thunderbird.

When I open the file with textedit, it begins with "SQLite format 3". It looks like a script to me, including things like "ON loginsL (is_deleted, origin)" and "idx_loginsM_is_overridden_origin".

I can delete and it's recreated when launching Thunderbird.

Is this file legit? Can anyone confirm having this file, too? I'm running Mac OS 15.7.1 with Thunderbird 145.

Thanks for listening
creator: junknpunk

title: Javascript
content:
I am in my seventies. I have the Firebird 1 tee shirt :-) . I recently received a missive from Thunderbird asking for a donation. I click through and get a donate button. THE DONATE BUTTON DOES NOT WORK in Firefox with NoScript. WTF.

I follow some IT forums and I am to update with security and userability issues. The best advice as I see it is to TURN OFF scripts with NoScript.

After a lot of faffing about I donated. When I first started working 55 years ago I given 2 bits of advice. 

 1  Never put obstacles in the way of customers paying.  2 Never put obstacles in the way of customers ordering.

I think you should heed the first bit of advice. How many Thunderbird users were tempted to donate but were in a similar position to me and gave up?
creator: ffpi

title: Falha ao enviar mensagem
content: Falha ao enviar mensagem. A mensagem não foi enviada porque a conexão com o servidor de envio (SMTP) email-ssl.com.br falhou. O servidor pode está indisponível ou recusando conexões SMTP. Verifique se as configurações do servidor de envio (SMTP) estão corretas e tente novamente.

M. Campbell

If I click on a different folder and then click on Inbox again, I can see the E-mails in the Inbox. - About once a week when I first open TB, the program begins downloading 10000 E-mails (sometimes more). Any help with these problems appreciated.

M. Campbell

title: Editing thundbird calendar entries - formats (e.g. tabs) are not shown when editing a calendar entry
content:
when starting a new calendar entry, this may look like this: textline one 

  textline two (three spaces at begin)   textline three (6 spaces at begin) 
     textline with tab right 
     * Bulleted list itemtextline with bullet point

end of testtext

After closing the edit, the text looks like this: textline one textline two (three spaces at begin) textline three (6 spaces at begin)

textline with tab right

textline with bullet point

end of testtext

However, the edits on my phone, as shown in the image, show that the text structure commands are still there (except bullet point got lost).

So here is my question: how can I get the calendar entries show the obviously maintained text structure?

title: CERTIFICATE ERROR
content:
On Monday, 17 November 2025 the Security Certificate expired and I stopped receiving emails both on my computer and Andriod Device. As a result I am not receiving any emails through Thunderbird, but I can go to email host site to view them.

I logged in my computer tonight and clicked here and clicked there and the error message: "The certificate for mail.homebizmall.net is not valid for that server. Someone could be trying to impersonate the server. Create an exception but this could mean that someone has stolen your certificate and may be able to impersonate you."

So it seems the POP server and the SMTP server certificates were only valid for 3 months and I was FORCED to create the exception for both servers. Now I am worried the security has been breached.

By clicking here and clicking there, I stumbled on a few people who seem to have this problem, but each with their own limitations. My operating System is Windows 10 without the option to upgrade. I have not extended the security updates because I don't understand if it is just the operating system uploading to the cloud or everything on my computer and I am not prepared to do the latter.

Is it safe to leave the band aid on that I have used for the moment? Can I create an exception for the phone? Or is there a glitch that someone needs to walk me through fixing?

Thanking you in advance

Clinton
creator: manager22
